raw_text:
446
481
453
485
442 Relations between the Ukrainian peacekeeping contingent and
the Bosnian Army had long been less than cordial . Zepa's Muslim
residents considered the Ukrainians, who were Slavs and Orthodox
Christians , to be biased toward the Serbs .
443 The New York Times, “ Serbs Push Into Zepa ' Safe Area'" by
John Pomfret, 17 July 1995 .
444 Reuters, “Radio Says Serbs Attack Zepa Enclave in Bosnia,"
15 July 1995 .
445 Reuters, “ UN Official Said to Predict Zepa's Fall in 48 Hours"
by Anthony Goodman , 14 July 1995 .
Reuters, “ Serbs Squeeze Zepa 'Safe Area' Refugees Languish "
by Sean Maguire, 14 July 1995 .
447 Reuters, “ No Reports of Serbs Gaining Ground at Zepa—UN ,”
15 July 1995 .
448 Reuters, “ No Bosnian Serb Attack on Bosnian Town Zepa --
UN ," 15 July 1995 .
449 Reuters, “Bosnians Demand UN Weapons in Zepa” by Sean
Maguire, 15 July 1995 .
450 Reuters, “ Serbs Press Attack on Zepa, Western Generals Meet,"
16 July 1995 .
451 Reuters, “ Serbs Attack Zepa , Red Cross Seeks Prisoners,"
16 July 1995 .
482 Reuters, “ Serbs Move to Within 1,500 Meters of Zepa Center”
by Kurt Schork, 16 July 1995 .
Reuters , “ Serbs Threaten Zepa, EU Ministers Talk ” by Kurt
Schork, 17 July 1995 .
454 The Washington Post, “ Serbs Push Into Zepa ' Safe Area '" by
John Pomfret, 17 July 1995 .
455 Reuters, “ Ukraine Draws Up Troop Withdrawal Plan for Zepa,"
17 July 1995 .
456 Reuters, “Government Troops Seize UN Weapons in Gorazde"
by Kurt Schork , 17 July 1995 .
Reuters, “ Serbs Launch Heavy Attack on Zepa Enclave ” by Kurt
Schork, 18 July 1995. See ICTY Krstic trial transcript for
29 June 2000.
458 Reuters, “ Zepa Moslems Threaten To Use UN Troops as
Shields” 18 July 1995 .
459 Reuters, “Serbs Attack Zepa, Moslems Seek Human Shields " by
Kurt Schork , 18 July 1995 .
460 Reuters , “ Bosnia Wants Civilians Evacuated From Zepa,"
17 July 1995 .
461 Reuters , “ Bosnian President Defends Call To Evacuate Zepa,"
18 July 1995 .
462 Reuters , “ Bosnian Serb Forces May Have Entered Zepa Town
UN ,” 19 July 1995 .
463 Reuters, “Mayor Says Zepa Not Taken, Panic Breaks Out,"
19 July 1995 .
464 Reuters, “ Zepa Surrenders to Serbs—Bosnian Serb Army ,"
19 July 1995 .
465 The New York Times, “ Second ' Safe Area ' in Eastern Bosnia
Overrun by Serbs ” by Chris Hedges, 20 July 1995 .
466 Reuters, “ No Evidence Serbs Are in Zepa Town—UN,” 20 July
1995 .
Reuters, “ Serbs Say They Start Evacuation of Zepa Moslems"
by Kurt Schork , 20 July 1995 .
468 Reuters , “ Serbs Press Zepa Moslems To Go , Bihac Enclave Hit "
by Kurt Schork, 20 July 1995 .
469 Reuters , “ Serb Commander Sets Deadline for Zepa Talks,"
20 July 1995 .
470 Reuters, “ Fighting Flares in Zepa After Deadline Expires” by
Kurt Schork , 20 July 1995 .
471 Reuters, “ Zepa Fighting Erupts as Big Powers Mull Action" by
Kurt Schork, 20 July 1995 .
472 Reuters , “ Bosnia Government Soldiers Threaten Peacekeepers ”
by Kurt Schork, 21 July 1995 .
473 Reuters , “ US Determined To Protect All Bosnia · Safe Areas' "
by Susan Cornwall, 24 July 1995 .
474 Reuters, “ Doubts Eat Away at West's Claim of Bosnia Resolve"
by Nicholas Doughty, 25 July 1995 .
479 Reuters, “ Bosnian Serbs Ignore Ambiguous Western Warning "
by Kurt Schork, 22 July 1995 .
476 Reuters, “ Zepa's Mayor 'We're Still Holding On " by Kurt
Schork , 22 July 1995 .
477 Reuters, “ Heavy Government Casualties in Zepa—UN ," 23 July
1995 .
478 Reuters, “ Zepa Reports New Serb Assault, Villages Burning" by
Kurt Schork, 24 July 1995 .
479 Reuters , “ Bosnian Enclave Evacuees Tell Tales of Terror" by
Kurt Schork, 26 July 1995 .
480 Reuters, “ Agreement Reached To Evacuate Zepa Civilians, ”
25 July 1995 .
Reuters , “ “ Bosnian Government Disputes Zepa Surrender
UN ” by Kurt Schork , 25 July 1995 .
482 Reuters, “ Serbs May Have Entered a Deserted Zepa, UN Says”
by Kurt Schork , 25 July 1995 .
483 Reuters, “ Bosnian Serbs Enter Zepa Town, Civilians Flee " by
Kurt Schork , 25 July 1995 .
484 Reuters, “UN Council Approves Evacuations From Zepa,”
25 July 1995 .
Reuters, “ Zepa Wounded Arrive in Sarajevo,” 26 July 1995 .
486 Reuters, “ Civilian Evacuation From Zepa Commences,” 26 July
1995 .
487 Reuters, “ UN Seeks to Avoid Atrocities in Zepa Exodus” by
Kurt Schork , 26 July 1995 .
488 Reuters, “ Mladic Talks Surrender With Zepa Commander,"
27 July 1995 .
489 Reuters, “ Bosnia May Give Serbs for Zepa Men in UN Swap ”
by Sean Maguire , 28 July 1995 .
190 Reuters, “ Bosnian Serbs Said To Have Killed Zepa Com
mander” 29 July 1995 .
491 Reuters, " Serbs Loot Zepa, Say They Killed Commander" by
Sean Maguire , 29 July 1995 .
492 Reuters, “ Zepa Talks Impasse Hits Serb War Effort — UN " by
Sean Maguire , 30 July 1995 .
493 Reuters, “ Bosnian Serbs Pull Best Troops Away From the
Enclave " by Sean Maguire, 31 July 1995 .
494 Reuters, “ Several Hundred Zepa Moslems Flee to Serbia "
1 August 1995 .
499 Reuters , “UN General's Helicopter Hit on Way To Meet
Mladic," 31 July 1995 .
496 The New   York Times, “Conflict in the Balkans : The Policy, US
Weighs a Response to French Call on Bosnia " by Alison Mitchell,
15 July 1995 .
497 Reuters, “ France To Offer Bosnia Action Plan Amid Blame
Game ” by Paul Taylor, 15 July 1995 .
498 The New York Times, “Conflict in the Balkans : In Paris, France
Asks Allies To Help Hold . Safe Areas' " by Craig R. Whitney,
15 July 1995 .
499 In part, Chirac said that:
I owe it to the truth to say that up to now the contacts the
French Government had made have not been positive. I
deplore that . For the moment we are alone ... Ofcourse, if
we want to do strictly nothing, then I don't see why UN
forces should be ... accomplices to this barbarism , accom
plices to these practices of ethnic cleansing ...
Reuters, “ Serbs Attack Zepa 'Safe Area ,' Again
Challenge UN ” by Sean Maguire, 14 July 1995.
457
467
410
